Author: meimeiya
Text: sadly, it's probably not accurate. because the calculator is using the "official" serving size, but because of human error + most locations overestimating so that customers feel like they're getting their money's worth, the actual portions are usually larger than the calculated ones. i've been to some chipotles that give a pretty small portion (so it's probably closer to the nutrition info), but the one close to me now serves enormous amounts of food. it's a situation where you kind of just have to use your best judgment with how much there is
